title: Understand Multiplication and Division of Whole Numbers
description: Learn the meaning of multiplication as repeated addition and division as equal sharing or grouping. Includes visual models, examples, and real-world connections.

title: Multiplication Facts: Use Patterns
description: Explore how multiplication facts follow patterns using arrays, skip counting, and number properties.

title: Apply Properties: Multiplication Facts for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8
description: Apply the associative, commutative, and distributive properties to learn and practice multiplication facts.

title: Use Multiplication to Divide: Division Facts
description: Use multiplication relationships to find division facts, including using inverse operations and fact families.

title: Fluently Multiply and Divide within 100
description: Build speed and accuracy in solving multiplication and division problems up to 100.

title: Connect Area to Multiplication and Addition
description: Understand how area models can represent multiplication and addition.

title: Represent and Interpret Data
description: Use bar graphs, pictographs, and line plots to represent and analyze data.

title: Use Strategies and Properties to Add and Subtract
description: Apply mental math strategies and number properties to perform addition and subtraction efficiently.

title: Fluently Add and Subtract within 1,000
description: Use place value understanding and algorithms to add and subtract up to 1,000.

title: Multiply by Multiples of 10
description: Multiply one-digit numbers by multiples of 10 (10–90) using place value and properties of operations.

title: Use Operations with Whole Numbers to Solve Problems
description: Solve multi-step word problems using the four operations and represent using equations with unknowns.

title: Understand Fractions as Numbers
description: Understand fractions as part of a whole and as points on the number line.

title: Fraction Equivalence and Comparison
description: Learn to recognize and generate equivalent fractions and compare them using reasoning and visual models.

title: Solve Time, Capacity, and Mass Problems
description: Tell and write time to the nearest minute and solve word problems involving time, volume, and mass.

title: Attributes of Two-Dimensional Shapes
description: Classify two-dimensional shapes by their attributes such as number of sides, angles, and symmetry.

title: Solve Perimeter Problems
description: Find the perimeter of polygons by adding side lengths or using formulas.

title: Solve multi-step word problems with all four operations (including remainders)
description: Learn how to solve multi-step word problems with all four operations (including remainders). Practice with examples and visual models.

title: Practice Solve multi-step word problems with all four operations (including remainders) Concepts
description: Reinforce understanding of solve multi-step word problems with all four operations (including remainders) with guided practice and real-world problems.

title: Interpret expressions flexibly (letters as unknowns, mental estimation)
description: Learn how to interpret expressions flexibly (letters as unknowns, mental estimation). Practice with examples and visual models.

title: Practice Interpret expressions flexibly (letters as unknowns, mental estimation) Concepts
description: Reinforce understanding of interpret expressions flexibly (letters as unknowns, mental estimation) with guided practice and real-world problems.

title: Study factors and multiples (1–100); categorize numbers as prime or composite
description: Learn how to study factors and multiples (1–100); categorize numbers as prime or composite. Practice with examples and visual models.

title: Practice Study factors and multiples (1–100); categorize numbers as prime or composite Concepts
description: Reinforce understanding of study factors and multiples (1–100); categorize numbers as prime or composite with guided practice and real-world problems.

description: Learn how to generate & analyze number/shape patterns; explain features like alternating odd/even. Practice with examples and visual models.

title: Practice Generate & analyze number/shape patterns; explain features like alternating odd/even Concepts
description: Reinforce understanding of generate & analyze number/shape patterns; explain features like alternating odd/even with guided practice and real-world problems.

title: Understand place value up to 1,000,000
description: Learn how to understand place value up to 1,000,000. Practice with examples and visual models.

title: Multiply & divide by powers of 10
description: Learn how to multiply & divide by powers of 10. Practice with examples and visual models.

title: Practice Multiply & divide by powers of 10 Concepts
description: Reinforce understanding of multiply & divide by powers of 10 with guided practice and real-world problems.

title: Read/write numbers in words, numerals, expanded form; compare using >, <, =
description: Learn how to read/write numbers in words, numerals, expanded form; compare using >, <, =. Practice with examples and visual models.

title: Practice Read/write numbers in words, numerals, expanded form; compare using >, <, = Concepts
description: Reinforce understanding of read/write numbers in words, numerals, expanded form; compare using >, <, = with guided practice and real-world problems.

title: Round multi-digit numbers to any place
description: Learn how to round multi-digit numbers to any place. Practice with examples and visual models.

description: Learn how to perform multi-digit addition and subtraction using the standard algorithm. Practice with examples and visual models.

title: Practice Perform multi-digit addition and subtraction using the standard algorithm Concepts
description: Reinforce understanding of perform multi-digit addition and subtraction using the standard algorithm with guided practice and real-world problems.

description: Learn how to multiply four-digit numbers by one-digit. Practice with examples and visual models.

description: Learn how to multiply two-digit by two-digit (place-value strategies & models). Practice with examples and visual models.

description: Learn how to divide four-digit dividends by one-digit divisors; interpret quotients & remainders. Practice with examples and visual models.

description: Reinforce understanding of compare fractions with different numerators/denominators (benchmarks/common denominators) with guided practice and real-world problems.
